SEARCH
Package AntColonyOpt

Interface ColonyInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
Colony
public interface ColonyInterface
The decision to create this Colony Interface was made with the objective of retrieving all the information about a specific ant within the colony.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    AntInterface
    getColonyOfAnts(int numberOfAnt)
    Retrieves a specific colony of ants from the colony based on the number of ants.
    void
    initializeColony(int numberOfAnts, Node nestNode)
    Initializes the colony with the specified number of ants and nest node.

  • Method Details

    • initializeColony

      void initializeColony(int numberOfAnts, Node nestNode)
      Initializes the colony with the specified number of ants and nest node.
      Parameters:
      numberOfAnts - the number of ants to initialize the colony with
      nestNode - the nest node where the colony is initialized

    • getColonyOfAnts

      AntInterface getColonyOfAnts(int numberOfAnt)
      Retrieves a specific colony of ants from the colony based on the number of ants.
      Parameters:
      numberOfAnt - the number of ants in the colony to retrieve
      Returns:
      the colony of ants with the specified number of ants
